text:
refer to as DeepConvLSTM. This architecture combines convolutional and recurrent
layers. The convolutional layers act as feature extractors and provide abstract
representations of the input sensor data in feature maps. The recurrent layers model
the temporal dynamics of the activation of the feature maps.
